Oookay, that is scary.  Glad to hear all is well now.

Robin


  ----- Orig=
inal Message ----- 
  From: Carol B.<mailto:cbreck@...> 
  To: EVP-I=
TC@yahoogroups.com<mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com> 
  Sent: Tuesday, Januar=
y 15, 2008 3:26 PM
  Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: PROTECTION RITUAL FILE POST=
ED


  He said threatening things. He threw a shelf off my wall about 5
  f=
eet...showed up as shadows in the hallway...talking at
  night....oppressiv=
e tight feeling in my chest if he was active...high emf
  readings when he =
was active..

  > Carol, I guess my confusion is over how a ritual works to=
 stop an entity
  > intent on causing harm. I'm someone who prays and medit=
ates often, but I
  > wonder if bad spirits are capable of disregarding the=
 boundaries we set
  > for them. I do know that when I told my threatening =
EVPer to go back
  > outside it worked; in fact, I haven't been able to rec=
ord ANY EVP in my
  > house since then. I've never gotten the cursing so ma=
ny people describe.
  > Besides having a bad mouth, did the Waverly entity =
do other things?
  >
  > Robin
  >
  >
  > ----- Original Message -----
  >=
 From: Carol B.<mailto:cbreck@...<mailto:cbreck%40elknet.net>>
  > T=
o: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com<mailto:EVP-ITC%40yahoogroups.com><mailto:EVP-ITC=

ary 15, 2008 2:41 PM
  > Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: PROTECTION RITUAL FILE =
POSTED
  >
  >
  > Robin...
  > I never use protection...and have had a pro=
blem with a spirit that came
  > home with us from Waverly. He's gone now, =
with the help of a great
  > individual. I have evp's of this entity saying=
 horrible things. I think
  > I may start using protection now...
  >
  > C=
arol B.
  >
  > > As someone who has never used a protection ritual (even t=
hough I
  > consider
  > > myself a very spiritual person), I'm not sure I =
understand what the
  > ritual
  > > is intended to protect the person invo=
king it from. I'm not being a
  > smart
  > > ass; I'm simply trying to lea=
rn. Can we be hurt physically or
  > psychically
  > > by certain spirits, =
or can our experimentation open a dark portal
  > that's
  > > not meant to=
 be opened? My instinct has always been that if I don't
  > > acknowledge e=
vil it can have no power over me, but perhaps that's
  > > ignorant. I once=
 invited spirits into my house from outside and
  > > immediately recorded =
a negative EVP while heating a cup of coffee in
  > the
  > > microwave. I =
was too ecstatic to be frightened by the message, but
  > since
  > > then =
I've wondered what kind of spirit would want to say such a thing
  > to
  >=
 > me and if I should be more cautious in the future. I would love some
  >=
 > feedback on this recording.
  > >
  > > Robin
  > >
  > >
  > >
  > > --=

 create what you expect to
  > > get. If you use protection BS, you'll have=
 convinced yourself that
  > > there is something to be affraid of, and so =
you will tend to creat a
  > > thoughtform to fulfill that expectation.

tection ritual I use before every
  > > > session, I have been using it for=
 quite a while now and have had no
  > > > problems with dark heads other t=
han the occasional curse word.
  > > >
  > > > I recommend that all researc=
hers experienced and new use this or a
  > > > similar protection ritual be=
fore every box session if you are not
  > > > already.
  > > >
  > > > hey =
it's better to have it and not need it , than need it and not
  > > have
  =
> > > it!
  > > >
  > > > I will post it in the files section in a folder m=
arked
  > > > "protection ritual"
  > > >
  > > > Thanks guy's
  > > >
  > =
> > Bruce
